page.title: 06Employment
page.content: Ten out of twenty three children's parents,who where asked, work in Reepham.They do things like teaching yoga, graphic design, upholstering furniture, working in shops, being a school secretary or a dinner lady. There are various shops,a bank, a building society, a library and an architect who employ people in Reepham. A lot of people who work in Reepham work in the Brewery House Hotel as waitresses or washing up. Eight of the other parents work in Norwich doing things like working for a steel company,being bank managers,a traing officer,air traffic controllers and a university secratary Two parents work in Lenwade and Foulsham as a foreman for a factory making reinforced concrete products and a buyer for a building firm.
